entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 p.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -6.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 12:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
